video.title: Stella and Sam
video.synopsis: Fueled only by their imaginations, spirited nine-year-old Stella and her shy little brother Sam take on the fanciful wonders of outdoor exploration.

episodes.synopsis: Sam tries to make his old sweater special before passing it down to Fred. / Stella has to get Sam out of bed in time for a special breakfast.
episodes.title: Hand-Me-Down Sweater / Breakfast for Two

episodes.synopsis: Fred helps Stella and Sam track down Sam's missing red scarf; Stella helps Sam prepare for his first backyard camp-out.
episodes.title: Sam's Scarf / Night Fairies

episodes.synopsis: Sam wishes he were bigger but learns that being small can be handy sometimes. / Sam and Owen discover different ways to have fun with boxes.
episodes.title: Big Sam / Box Builders

episodes.synopsis: Sam pretends to be a superhero but comes to Fred's rescue for real; muddy Fred needs to get cleaned up but hates having a bath.
episodes.title: Super Sam / Fred's Bath

episodes.synopsis: Sam learns to skate with the help of a snowman; a heavy snowfall creates a winter wonderland for Stella and Sam to explore.
episodes.title: Sam and the Snowman / To the North Pole

episodes.synopsis: Stella's school project inspires a quest to see a Chinese dragon; Stella and Sam venture downstairs at night to search for Fred and a missing kite.
episodes.title: Trip to China / Kite Night

episodes.synopsis: Stella's make-believe animal safari has Sam and Owen monkeying around; Stella has a remedy for Sam's stubbed toe: silly soup with funny ingredients.
episodes.title: Trip to Africa / Laugh-A-Bit Soup

episodes.synopsis: Stella strikes a deal with a tree to get back Sam's toy airplane that's stuck in its branches; Sam loses a treasured memento he found at the beach.
episodes.title: Tree Wishes / Skippy and Sam

episodes.synopsis: Sam wants to perform in Stella’s concert but doesn’t have an instrument to play. / Sam hopes for wet weather so he can try out his new rain boots.
episodes.title: Meadow Melody / Sam's New Boots

episodes.synopsis: Stella takes Sam and Owen to an imaginary planet where kiwi fruit grows; Sam befriends a cricket and helps it find a new home.
episodes.title: Stella from Planella / A Home for Cricket

episodes.synopsis: The neighbor's cat disappears after the kids use it in their magic show; a funny game of follow-the-leader helps Stella and Sam find their ball.
episodes.title: Where's Pattycake? / Follow Me!

episodes.synopsis: Sam hopes Fred has enough talent to join Stella's circus; Stella takes Sam on a fairy-tale quest to find a good ending for her unfinished storybook.
episodes.title: Stella's Circus / Stella's Storybook

episodes.synopsis: After Stella surprises Sam with a card and gift for Brother's Day, Sam makes plans for Sister's Day; Stella helps Sam befriend a fawn in the meadow.
episodes.title: Sam and the Sky Painter / Deer Friend
